name: Lost In (The Old Tapes)
description:
It is not as simple as it seems.

The first steps are always clumsy and don't bring the result you need. However, failure isn't a reason to stop. In this game you have to solve untrivial tasks and make moral choices, have to come back and search for another path. This world is not for those who like to go baldheaded, crushing walls; It's a dark and vicious one , the path here has to be studied carefully and walked thoughtfully.
